channel.title: How do i make shops?
channel.description: hi, i want to know how to make my shops work, i have shops in a shopping area but i wanted to put a shop somewhere else So i did ::npc 548 and i got the shop i wanted, but when i clicked "Trade" nothing happened. I need some help :o

item.title: How do i make shops?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

you cannot trade npcs when you spawn them. you must add them to your autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make shops?
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

hi, i want to know how to make my shops work,
i have shops in a shopping area but i wanted to put a shop somewhere else
So i did ::npc 548 and i got the shop i wanted, but when i clicked “Trade” nothing happened. I need some help :o
